question: What is the theme of the World Sustainable Development Summit (WSDS-2019)?
option1: Attaining the 2030 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise
option2: Attaining the 2050 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise
option3: Attaining the 2040 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise
option4: Attaining the 2020 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise
answer: Attaining the 2030 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise
explanation: The World Sustainable Development Summit (WSDS) is The Energy and Resources Institute\'s (TERI) annual flagship event. The 2019 edition of WSDS was held in New Delhi with theme \'Attaining the 2030 Agenda: Delivering on Our Promise\' on 11th-13th February. It was inaugurated by the Vice President of India,  M. Venkaiah Naidu. The WSDS brings together Nobel laureates, political leaders, decision-makers from bilateral and multilateral institutions, business leaders, high-level functionaries from the diplomatic corps, scientists and researchers, media personnel, and members of civil society; on a common platform to deliberate on issues related to sustainable development.
